code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{Card,ListGroup,Container,Row,Col}from"react-bootstrap";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ItemList=()=>{const[items,setItems]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("/api/Django/");setItems(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching data:",error);}};fetchData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{className:"mt-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-center",children:"Lista de Itens"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:items.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:4,className:"mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:"border-primary",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Text,{children:["Descri\xE7\xE3o:"," ",item.description||"Sem descrição"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListGroup,{className:"list-group-flush",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListGroup.Item,{className:"bg-light",children:"Mais detalhes..."})})]})})},item.id))})]});};export default ItemList;
